definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The APU engine is completely enclosed in a titanium shroud.

sentences.english: Radiological health protection standards for X-ray examinations of child-bearing age women and pregnant women.

sentences.chinese: 穿戴適當的防護服和手套。

sentences.english: Actuator design with fully sealed waterproof high degree of protection.
sentences.chinese: 執行機構採用全密封防水設計防護等級高。

sentences.english: Development of research on protective zircaloy claddings in nuclear reactor was reviewed.

sentences.english: The Three North Shelterbelt is a forestation undertaking.

sentences.english: The present invention discloses a silk floss protective clothing and its production method.

to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes

disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters
